text: To change your Minecraft username,
first, open up your Minecraft launcher.

Next, click on "Settings"
at the bottom left.
Then click on "Accounts" at the top here.

On this page, you'll find
all the Minecraft accounts
you are currently logged in to.

Choose the Minecraft account
you wish to change the name of

and then click on the
three dots next to it.
Then click on "Manage account."

After that, you will be
automatically redirected

to the login page on
Minecraft's official website.

Simply enter your email
address and password you use
for your Minecraft account to sign in.

After doing so, you can now
see your account settings.

At the bottom of the page,
under "PROFILE INFORMATION,"

you should be able to see
your Minecraft username.

Click on "Change" and
enter your new username.

Players are only allowed
to change their username
once every 30 days.
Once you've decided on a username
and you're ready to claim it,

you can then click on
"CHANGE PROFILE NAME."
